column5: I remember reading a post last week where it was mentioned that a specific sunscreen also worked as a good insect repellent. For the life of me I can't remember what brand it was and I can't seem to find where it was posted. A little help please. Does anyone recall what it was? We leave for Canada next Friday and I was hoping to get some before we go.
We have found two products that work reasonably well 1. Repel Lemon Eucalyptus Insect Repellent 2. Coppertone Sport in the spray can.
Yep. Freytown has it right......that's your chicken. I think I use the SPF 30.Hope you have a great trip.PjShorthorn
Thanks all! I'll make sure to get some today. The countdown is now just 5 days. Woohoo!
That is just not fair PjShorthorn
